body.p: Enclosed is formal testimony that I will, with the leave of Heaven, keep my vow. And if in the profoundest secrecy I may connect the name of BaringThomas Baring (1799-1873), banker. Entered the family banking firm, of which he became head; a director of the Bank of England 1848-67; MP 1835-7 and 1844-73.with the word Failure, I waft you this breath of suspicion that he broke down in his rare Spanish Wine when we dined there together so admirably. I look to you with a serene confidence, and hope I shall come to the consideration of those two Vintages in a prepared frame of mind.
